text:
Custom CRM Cards in Inbox

I found the two same suggestions on forum and here.

<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Custom-CRM-Cards-in-the-Conversation-Inbox-HelpDesk/idi-p/864279>

<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C05R599UA12/p1707170650786549>

From my understanding, CRM cards are provided in Contact, Companies, Deals, and Tickets tabs at the moment.

I believe that providing custom CRM cards could help users in various ways as it might need us to figure something out and respond asap in certain cases.

My use case will be displaying important keywords on the side in in box based on client's types and chat with specific conditions.

Seeing previous suggestions and the comments on the suggestions, I am certain that there would be more use cases.

Thank you for considering my suggestions.
If it's already possible to implement, please comment here. Thank you.

<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C05R599UA12/p1699888227416429>

This is one of use cases. Actually, he already provided his use case on Nov 2023 before the question he made in Feb this year.
